name: Sonoran Desert
hint: Hot desert spanning Arizona and Mexico, home to the iconic saguaro cactus

name: Mojave Desert
hint: California desert home to Joshua trees and Death Valley, the hottest place on Earth

name: Chihuahuan Desert
hint: Largest desert in North America, spanning Texas, New Mexico, and northern Mexico

name: Great Basin Desert
hint: Largest cold desert in North America, covering most of Nevada and parts of Utah

name: Colorado Plateau
hint: Semi-arid high desert plateau with dramatic mesas, arches, and canyons in the Four Corners region

name: Painted Desert
hint: Colorful badlands in northeastern Arizona with layers of red, orange, and purple rock

name: Black Rock Desert
hint: Nevada playa desert famous as the site of Burning Man and land speed records

name: Arctic Desert
hint: Cold polar desert covering Canada's northernmost islands with extremely low precipitation

name: Altar Desert
hint: Part of the Sonoran Desert in northwestern Mexico with North America's largest sand dunes

name: Red Desert
hint: High desert in south-central Wyoming, largest unfenced area in the contiguous US
